pages.text: $(2)Scavenger$() is a Masterwork enchantment for swords.$(p)It gives a 2.5% chance per level to roll loot drops twice when you kill a mob.$(p)When successful, it will be as if you had just killed two of the same entity.
This enchantment works on all entities, including bosses like $(8)Withers$().$(p)It also stacks with $(9)Looting$().
